title: Get CAR MODEL Node by ID
user_story:
As an API consumer \
When I have the ID of an unknown car model\
I want to be able to load that car model\
So I can find out the name and its other properties
description:
# **Response **

**happy path**

* positive HTTP status code (200)
* a simple JSON with the following properties:
  * id: integer (mandatory field)
  * name: string (mandatory field)

**unhappy path**

* negative HTTP status code (404)
* a plain text response stating the problem

# **NOT in scope for this iteration**

* other core properties, like `built_from` and `built_to` 
* meta information, like created\_at or updated\_at
* auth / security
* proper JSON structure according to the JSON:API
* relationships with other nodes (e.g. brands or car model variants)

# **Acceptance Criteria**

**Behavior (Business logic)**

* an existing car model can be loaded successfully
* error when a non-existing car model is requested
